title: Tales Of The Stellar Unknown
alternative_title: Qi Xing Lu ; Strange Star Record ; Qí Xīng Lù ; 奇星箓
status: Qi Xing Lu ; Strange Star Record ; Qí Xīng Lù ; 奇星箓
description:
Description :
        Qi Xing, your average high schooler, stumbles across a mysterious seven-star disc. But this ain't no ordinary frisbee. Suddenly, the disc drags him into the "Disc World" a mind-blowing realm where his crazy adventure kicks off.Through a twist of fate, Qi Xing becomes a cultivator, a master of countless Daoist techniques.As he unlocks the secrets of the Seven Star Disc, a hidden power within him the Primordial Celestial Qibegins to awaken. But with every revelation, he gets sucked deeper into a conspiracy surrounding the legendary "Path of Immortality" through which he uncovers the truth about achieving immortality in the World within the Disc
